Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Textile
Description: This is a piece of fabric entirely made of ochre-coloured linen. The weft is very delicately woven. On the edge, there is a braid of linen to which eight fringes have been attached. These are spaced from each other by 1 or 2 cm. The fringes are made of three strands of linen and their length varies between 2,5 and 8 cm. The longest fringe ends in a knot.
